attributes.action: call an independent public inquiry into the death of Baby P in Haringey
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The death of this child is nothing short of a tragedy. Measures must be taken and a robust framework put in place to minimise the risk of this happening again. 

In addition, someone must be held accountable and if appropriate, a criminal prosecution followed through.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
